
.. _table:

===========================================
:mod:`rusty.table` -- RST table generation
===========================================
.. module:: table
   :platform: Unix, Windows
   :synopsis: Generate rST tables from tuples
.. moduleauthor:: Zeth (http://commandline.org.uk/code/table.py)


Generates rST tables easily. Used by :mod:`rusty.xmltable`
  
.. automodule:: rusty.table

.. autoclass:: rusty.table.Table

.. automethod:: rusty.table.Table.create_table
